title: Textile, 1920–30
dimensions:

Pattern: Visual repeat unit:  height: 34cm (13 3/8")                                                     width: 17cm (6 5/8")                                  Technical repeat unit: height: 34cm (13 3/8")                                                     width: unknown                                      Pattern printed beyond selvedge.
